'''Ethics''' is the general term for attempts to state or determine what is [[good|Goodness and value theory]], both for the individual and for the society as a whole. It is often termed the [[science]] of [[morality]].
+
'''Ethics''' is the general term for attempts to state or determine what is [[Goodness and value theory|good]], both for the individual and for the society as a whole. It is often termed the [[science]] of [[morality]].
     
In [[philosophy]], '''ethics''' is one of the three major traditional areas of investigation, alongside [[metaphysics]] and [[logic]]. See particularly [[meta-ethics]].
 
In [[philosophy]], '''ethics''' is one of the three major traditional areas of investigation, alongside [[metaphysics]] and [[logic]]. See particularly [[meta-ethics]].
